## Welcome to my website!

I am an engineer and a PhD student in [EMSE](https://emse.engineering.gwu.edu/) at [George Washington University](https://www.gwu.edu/), supervised by professor [John Helveston](https://www.jhelvy.com). I do {{< var rlink >}} development and data analysis in human behavior using choice models. I develop websites and webapps using {{< var quarto >}} and {{< var shiny >}}.

**Ongoing projects:**

1. [BEV Smart Charging](https://sc.pingfanhu.com): A survey-based data analysis studying Battery Electric Vehicle owners' willingness to opt in smart charging programs, funded by the {{< var sloan >}}.
